sentences.sContent: Is there a shortfall or oversupply?
sentences.sCn: 是否有供应不足或者供给过多？

sentences.sContent: OPEC's members have been trying to limit production to ease oversupply.
sentences.sContent_eng: OPEC's members have been trying to limit production to ease oversupply.
sentences.sCn: 欧佩克成员国一直试图限制产量以缓解供应过剩。

sentences.sContent: Worse, the extreme growth of investment during the financial crisis has added to the problem of oversupply.
sentences.sContent_eng: Worse, the extreme growth of investment during the financial crisis has added to the problem of oversupply.
sentences.sCn: 更糟的是，在金融危机期间，极端的投资增长进一步加剧了供过于求的问题。

remMethod.val: over(过多) + supply(供应) → 过多供给

words.tran: 垫得又软又厚的；冗长的；多油的
装填过度；涂油过多（overstuff的过去分词）
过分强调；过分拉紧（或紧张）
使过度紧张；使工作过度；伸张过度
装填过度；给（软椅、沙发等）加厚软垫

trans.tranOther: to supply too much (material, etc) or too many (goods, people, etc)
the state of having more of something than you need or can sell
